verbs.description: If President Donald Trump taps [ARG1: freshman U.S. Rep. Brian Mast , R - Palm City] , to [V: be] [ARG2: secretary of Veterans Affairs] , Mast 's already contested Palm Beach - Treasure Coast congressional seat would become a top pickup opportunity for Democrats .

If President Donald Trump taps freshman U.S. Rep. Brian Mast , R - Palm City , to be secretary of Veterans Affairs , Mast 's [ARGM-TMP: already] [V: contested] [ARG1: Palm Beach - Treasure Coast congressional seat] would become a top pickup opportunity for Democrats .

If President Donald Trump taps freshman U.S. Rep. Brian Mast , R - Palm City , to be secretary of Veterans Affairs , Mast 's already contested Palm Beach - Treasure Coast congressional seat [V: would] become a top pickup opportunity for Democrats .

[ARGM-ADV: If President Donald Trump taps freshman U.S. Rep. Brian Mast , R - Palm City , to be secretary of Veterans Affairs] , [ARG1: Mast 's already contested Palm Beach - Treasure Coast congressional seat] [ARGM-MOD: would] [V: become] [ARG2: a top pickup opportunity for Democrats] .
